Title: Relates to directing the department of housing preservation and development of the city of New York to promulgate rules and regulations regarding mutual housing companies considering dissolution
Summary: Directs the department of housing preservation and development of the city of New York to promulgate rules and regulations regarding mutual housing companies considering dissolution and/or reconstitution.
LawCode: Add ยง35-a, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to directing the department of housing preservation and development of the city of New York to promulgate rules and regulations regarding mutual housing companies considering dissolution and/or reconstitution
